easy.q: I have a face but no eyes, a hand but no arms. I help you tell time. What am I?
easy.hint: Look at something that ticks and shows hours.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer remains. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think of a short word that changes when you add letters.

hard.q: A box holds four colors: red, blue, green, yellow. If you swap the red and blue, then swap green and yellow, what rule did you follow?
hard.hint: Consider how you rearrange items in pairs.
